sacl-property-cascade-permissions: This porperty is set if permissions are to be cascaded.  Translate it as you would translate the header of a table column/row.
sacl-template-render-denied-anonymous: Error message seen by an anonymous user when being denied access
sacl-template-render-denied-registered: Error message seen by registered user when being denied access
sacl-key-too-short: Error message given when the private link key is too short
sacl-private-links-disabled: Message appended to a private link when the feature has been disabled by an admin
